text: ovunaṭa pera siṭi nūh, ād hā samūdgē janayāgē da ibrāhīmgē janayā, madyan vāsīhu hā uḍu yaṭikuru va peraḷā dǣmūvangē da puvata ovun veta nopæmiṇiyē da? ovungē dūtayō ovun veta pæhædili sādhaka saman̆ga pæmiṇiyōya. ebævin ovunaṭa aparādhayak kirīma allāhṭa novīya. namut ovuhu tamanṭama apāradha kara gannan vūha
